qa.name: Timmy
qa.appearance: Small for his age, with messy brown hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the best friends are the ones only you can see.
json_to_edit.description: Timmy's invisible friend helps him stand up to bullies in the school playground.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, distant laughter, gentle breeze
json_to_edit.name: Invisible Courage
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Timmy's invisible friend empowers him to confront his bullies.

qa.action: Timmy sits alone on a bench in a bustling playground, looking sad and isolated.

hf.action: A shimmer appears next to Timmy, suggesting the presence of his invisible friend.

tr.action: Timmy's expression changes from fear to determination as he listens to his invisible friend.

xc.action: A group of bullies approaches Timmy, but he stands up, looking confident.

ka.action: Timmy speaks up to the bullies, his posture straight and voice steady.

fn.action: The bullies look surprised and walk away, leaving Timmy with a smile of triumph.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 4, 1, 5, 2, 6, 3. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director. the new order will be 4, 1, 5, 2, 6, 3, which corresponds to the following shot keys: xc, qa, ka, hf, fn, tr. we'll update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to reflect this new order. no other changes will be made to the content of the shots or any other part of the json.
